entity

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • entity.Entity
      • entity.Player
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public final class Player
extends Entity
    This class should handle all of the things re lated to the Player. It should NOT handle drawing the GUI (beyond drawing the player sprite).
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
